docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Hi Everyone! My name is Alfonso Antonio — but you can call me “AA”.

I'm 25 years old and currently based in Manila, Philippines .

I recently graduated last 2024 on FEU Alabang 🔰 with a degree of Computer Engineering.

I worked as an SRE Associate at OpsWerks, serving mostly as an L1 on-call engineer for a Fortune 500 company specializing in payment systems. ⚙️💳 My responsibilities included monitoring system health, responding to service alerts, performing initial incident triage, internal and external partner communication, deployment management, and ensuring platform reliability during production issues. 👨‍💻

I’m passionate about fitness 💪, curious about cloud engineering ☁️, and I enjoy experimenting with Kubernetes, coding projects, and anything tech. Outside of that, I love exploring new ideas, improving my skills, hanging out with my friends 🥂, grabbing coffee ☕, exploring my city 🏢, Playing Dota, Valorant, Starcraft 2, and World of Warcraft 🎮 and building things just for fun.

Work In-progress 👷

docs.title: SRE Associate — OpsWerks ⚙️💳💵
docs.text:
L1 On-Call Engineer for a Fortune 500 Payment Systems Company

  • Participated in a 24×7 on-call rotation as an L1 Site Reliability Engineer, supporting a globally distributed digital payment platform serving millions of users.
  • Leveraged Splunk to investigate and analyze secure provisioning and transaction flows involving Secure Elements, GlobalPlatform APDU command exchanges, and cryptographic personalization processes — ensuring high availability, PCI DSS compliance, and rapid incident response across payment systems.
  • Reduced operational toil by fine-tuning alerts, creating and updating runbooks, and automating repetitive tasks to enable focus on higher-impact work.
  • Performed deployment management and post-deployment validation in collaboration with cross-functional engineering teams, ensuring smooth and reliable production releases.
  • Cross-collaborated with multiple teams—including Developers, DBAs, E2E Testers, Incident Management (IM), Partner PNOs, Engineering, and other stakeholders—to investigate and resolve complex issues.
  • Utilized Splunk for log analysis, impact count, incident investigation, and root cause identification to accelerate troubleshooting and improve system observability.

docs.title: Test Automation Intern — Grundfos 👨‍🔧📘🎭
docs.text:
• Turned 200+ test cases into test scripts using Playwright Test
  • Automated Test Scripts using Jenkins Pipeline
  • Generated Test Report on TestRail using trcli on Jenkins
  • Collaborated with Web Experience DK and PH Team and other developers and teams to ensure project goals were achieved and up to standard.
  • Created a wiki page to help the developers understand the fundamentals of Playwright Test, Test Automation, & Test report generation once the team migrated to Playwright

docs.title: Technical Skills
docs.text:

  • 🚀 Deployment Tools: Jenkins, TeamCity
  • 🧩 Version Control: Git, Bitbucket, GitHub
  • 📘 Languages: TypeScript, Java
  • 📊 API Testing & Tools: Postman, Basic SQL, SQL Developer
  • 📘 Project Management: Jira, Confluence
  • 🌐 Networking Fundamentals - Routing, DNS, SSL Certificate Rotation, Client - Server Relationship
  • 🖥️ Scripting: Bash
  • 📦 Containerization: Docker
  • ☸️ Orchestration: Kubernetes, Docker Swarm
  • ☁️ Cloud Computing: Amazon Web Services (EC2)
  • 📘 Markup Language: YAML, JSON
  • 🔧 IAS: Ansible
  • 🎭 Test Automation: Playwright Test
